name: Beam
public_notice: Merit Circle (MC) has migrated to Beam (BEAM) with a 1:100 conversion rate, from their older contract to a new one. The migration period has officially ended, please refer to this post for more information.

description.en: BEAM is the native cryptographic token that powers the Beam ecosystem. As an ERC-20 token, BEAM serves as the fundamental infrastructure layer that enables transactions on the Beam Network. The Beam ecosystem creates an environment where developers, creators, and users collaborate to build innovative digital experiences across multiple sectors such as gaming, artificial intelligence, NFTs, RWAs.
